meanings.definition: Lucites: a type of clear, acrylic plastic material
meanings.sent1: The display case was made of lucites, allowing everyone to see the valuable items inside.
meanings.sent2: She collected various lucites to decorate her room with modern style.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of the lucites, surprising the audience with a clear box trick.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the lucites, as if the plastic material itself found joy in her happiness.
meanings.sent5: The lucites shimmered under the bright lights, showcasing their transparent beauty.

meanings.definition: Lucites: plural form of lucite, referring to objects made of lucite material
meanings.sent1: The art gallery displayed stunning lucites, each sculpture crafted with precision.
meanings.sent2: The lucites on the shelf caught the sunlight, creating a dazzling display in the room.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the lucites were magical crystals, imagining they held special powers.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of lucites sparkled like jewels, adding elegance to her home decor.
meanings.sent5: The lucites seemed to glow in the dark, casting a soft, ethereal light in the room.
